promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive strong spider dark-type pokemon with ornate wings. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or spider. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Arachnite, a a massive strong spider dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Endgame, Claw Rend. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "spider", "dark" or "Arachnite". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, spider-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Lurking in fortress shadows, this massive arachnid shapes its web with a stealthy cunning. It uses its Endgame power and Claw Rend to trap prey.
